title: Buying a Skinfor vlad
body: hi all i love playing vlad but i am not sure on what skin to buy , i was thinking about getting his legendary bloodlord vlad but i wasnt sure if it was worth the Rp, my other one i was considering was soulstealer vlad , any opinions would be loved

replies.body: don't bother buying a skin just yet, wait until the 6.9 mana change patch,

Most people enjoy Soulstealer purely because its probably the "biggest" change. Colour.

Bloodlord is pretty nice, like most expensive skins they seem to have a different "feel". Its more than just the visuals.

But you'll def be happy with Soulstealer
Soul stealer is the best one imo, particle changes are pretty good
